dmg.description: SSF2 Delta Early Access 1: -------------------- * Almost every character in the cast completely rebalanced! * New engine, featuring a private online lobby, v0.9b SDI and much more! * Increased number of tourney-legal stages, including Fourside, Casino Night, and more! * Special Online Waiting Room! * And even more!

exe.description: SSF2 Delta Early Access 1: -------------------- * Cosalina, let me know if you can see this! * Almost every character in the cast completely rebalanced! * New engine, featuring a private online lobby, v0.9b SDI and much more! * Increased number of tourney-legal stages, including Fourside, Casino Night, and more! * Special Online Waiting Room! * And even more!
